Star Rating

  • Main info
  • Star Rating

Documentation of star rating module.

Files

app/styles/modules/_ratings.scss

Contents

  • Star Rating

Star Rating

Star rating is a form component that allows users to rate something by selecting stars. It is a set of radio buttons with stars as labels.

Example:

Hodnotenie

Code:
<h4 id="rating-label">Hodnotenie</h4>
<div class="rating-star rating-star--highlight-on-hover" role="radiogroup" aria-labelledby="rating-label">
  <input type="radio" name="rating" id="rating-1" value="1" class="rating-star__input" aria-label="1 z 5">
  <label for="rating-1" class="rating_star__item"><i class="fas fa-star fa-2x"></i></label>
  <input type="radio" name="rating" id="rating-2" value="2" class="rating-star__input" aria-label="2 z 5">
  <label for="rating-2" class="rating_star__item"><i class="fas fa-star fa-2x"></i></label>
  ... <!-- repeat for the total number of stars -->
</div>
